item.title: My brand new blog
item.author: Dany Laksono
item.description:
I’ve spent longer than I thought before this blog come to reality. I bought the domain for at least a year or so! but at least it’s here right now. I planned to move all my previous blogs hosted in * insert numbers of ‘instant’ bloggin platform here * to this Github-hosted site, so it may take another time until this blog will be fully operational.

DOCpad is my first option for this static blogging platform. It’s awesome and has lots of plugins for static and dynamic webpages. But Hugo seems to be faster and I thought I don’t really need much of Docpad functionalities (for now). And so this is it :)
